children.name:
AssertionError: 
 Expected status code: 400, but got: 502. Response: {'fault': {'faultstring': 'Unexpected EOF at target', 'detail': {'errorcode': 'messaging.adaptors.http.flow.UnexpectedEOFAtTarget'}}}
Verify that the POST Create API will fail if patient forename is invalid
Verify that the POST Create API will fail if patient surname is invalid

AssertionError: 
 Expected status code: 200, but got: 502. Response: {'fault': {'faultstring': 'Unexpected EOF at target', 'detail': {'errorcode': 'messaging.adaptors.http.flow.UnexpectedEOFAtTarget'}}}
Flu event is created and updated twice and read request fetch the latest version and Etag

AssertionError: Expected status code 204, but got 404. Response: {'resourceType': 'OperationOutcome', 'id': '996945b2-7ad8-49de-ac6f-10f7c4fc6a6b', 'meta': {'profile': ['https://simplifier.net/guide/UKCoreDevelopment2/ProfileUKCore-OperationOutcome']}, 'issue': [{'severity': 'error', 'code': 'not-found', 'details': {'coding': [{'system': 'https://fhir.nhs.uk/Codesystem/http-error-codes', 'code': 'NOT-FOUND'}]}, 'diagnostics': 'Immunization resource does not exist. ID: None'}]}
assert 404 == 204
 +  where 404 = <Response [404]>.status_code
 +    where <Response [404]> = <utilities.context.ScenarioContext object at 0x7fc270ffd2d0>.response
Verify that the GET method of Search API will be successful with all the valid parameters

AssertionError: Expected status code 204, but got 502. Response: {'fault': {'faultstring': 'Unexpected EOF at target', 'detail': {'errorcode': 'messaging.adaptors.http.flow.UnexpectedEOFAtTarget'}}}
assert 502 == 204
 +  where 502 = <Response [502]>.status_code
 +    where <Response [502]> = <utilities.context.ScenarioContext object at 0x7fc270d06c50>.response
Verify that the Update API will be fails if patient's date of birth has future or invalid formatted date
Verify that full dataset vaccination record will be created through batch file
